typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(cols = array(columns())) ~> CreateColumnArray
CreateColumnArray split(contains(cols,isNull(#item)),
	disjoint: false) ~> LookForNULLs@(good, bad)
LookForNULLs@good sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['movie'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
